meanings.definition: A type of monkey found in South America.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of uakaris swinging from tree to tree.
meanings.sent3: The uakaris in the zoo were playing with each other.
meanings.sent4: The uakaris' red faces stood out among the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The uakaris' playful antics entertained the visitors.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'uakari'.
meanings.sent1: There are many uakaris in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: The uakaris were grooming each other.
meanings.sent3: The group of uakaris chattered noisily.
meanings.sent4: The uakaris' calls echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The colorful uakaris moved gracefully through the trees.
